options.name: Armored Fighting
options.description: Gain +1 Dodge and +1 Block while wearing Medium and Heavy Armor

options.name: Physical Defense
options.description: Gain +1 Physical Mitigation on all Medium and Heavy Armor

options.name: Elemental Defense
options.description: Gain +1 Elemental Mitigation while wearing Medium and Heavy Armor

options.name: Improved Mitigation
options.description: Gain +1 Physical and +1 Elemental Mitigation on all Medium and Heavy Armor

options.name: Efficient Movement
options.description: Remove the Stealth Penalty and gain +1 Dodge while wearing Medium and Heavy Armor

options.name: Unencumbered
options.description: Remove 1 Level of Casting Penalty from Medium and Heavy Armor and gain +1 Block and +1 Dodge while wearing Medium or Heavy Armor.

options.name: Action : Charging Sprint
options.description: You can move your Movement Speed plus an additional 2 Units but you can only move in a straight line. If you collide with any Creature your size or smaller, you can make a Shove Attack against them. Until you fail a Shove Attack, you can continue to move in the straight line.

options.name: Surprisingly Nimble
options.description: Gain +1 Movement Speed while wearing Medium or Heavy Armor and +1 Acrobatics

options.name: Armored Expert
options.description: Gain +2 Physical and +1 Elemental Mitigation on all Medium and Heavy Armor

options.name: Free Action : Counterguard
options.description: You make an Attack with a melee weapon without applying your damage bonus modifier. If the attack hits, it counts as if you had taken the Defense Action until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Reaction : Versatile Armor
options.description: In response to taking any Damage type besides Psychic and True Damage, further reduce the damage by an amount equal to your Physical Mitigation.

options.name: Metal Skin
options.description: You have Immunity to the Dazed condition and gain +1 Block and +2 Physical Mitigation

options.name: Free Action : Body Check
options.description: Make a Shove Attack by using your body, dealing Damage equal to your Physical Mitigation regardless if you succeed or not.

options.name: Master Armorer
options.description: Gain +1 Block, +1 Dodge, +1 Resist while wearing Armor and Gain +1 Movement Speed
